seed_pair.target: It's useful to to start talking as soon as you to can.
seed_pair.known: Es útil comenzar a hablar tan pronto como puedas.

I'm going to to start | I'm going to to start talking | to to start talking | to to talk more | to talk more | more soon

I'm not going to to to be able to | I'm going to to to be able to | to to to be able to to remember | to remember easily | easily
S0025: vas a ayudarme | antes de que tenga que ir | tenga que ir
you're going to to help me | before I to have to go | I to have to go
S0026: me gusta sentir | sentir como si | como si estuviera | estuviera casi preparado | casi preparado | preparado para ir | para ir
I like feeling | to feel as if | as if I were | I were nearly ready | nearly ready | ready to go | to go
S0027: no me gusta | no me gusta tomar | tomar demasiado tiempo | demasiado tiempo | tiempo para responder | para responder
